field.label: Store Id
field.comment: Story Id uniquely identify the store on Wizzy.

field.label: Store Secret
field.comment: Store Secret is a unique secret code to communicate with Wizzy.

field.label: API Key
field.comment: Paste API key from Wizzy.

field.label: Enable Sync?
field.comment: Enable/Disable Sync with Wizzy.

field.label: Enable Autocomplete?
field.comment: Enable/Disable Wizzy's autocomplete functionality on Store.

field.label: Enable Instant Search?
field.comment:
Enable/Disable Wizzy's instant search functionality on Store.
If Autocomplete is turned on, Search as-you-type is disabled by default and replaced with search on enter/form submission.

field.label: Instant Search Form Submission Behaviour
field.comment:
Behaviour of instance search form submission.
This config is used when autocomplete and instant search is enabled or only instant search is enabled with form submission as behaviour.

field.label: Enable Analytics?
field.comment:
Enable/Disable Wizzy's search analytics on Store.
If turned off, Wizzy won't be able to track click & conversion analytics.

field.label: Generate Search & Filters Events in FB & Google?
field.comment: If set as Yes, Wizzy will generate required Search & Filters events in your FB and Google Analytics. Which will help marketing team to target those specific users.

field.label: Replace Category Page?
field.comment: Replace default Magento category page with Wizzy's results page.

field.label: Category Click Behaviour (From Autocomplete)
field.comment: Select behaviour when user clicks on category suggestion from autocomplete menu. You can either hit search with category keyword or open the category page. (Former one is preferred as it will load the results faster)

field.label:
Do you sell products
for multiple age group/genders?
field.comment: If yes, please set the following configuration for Wizzy to identify Age Group/Genders from your catalogue's data.

field.label: Identified Using?
field.comment: Select how genders/age groups can be identified using your catalogue's data.

field.label: Categories Identity Configuration
field.comment: Select how individual gender/age group can be identified using your categories data.

field.label: Parent Categories Consideration
field.comment: Do you want Wizzy to look non-assigned parent categories of product ?

field.label: Attributes Identity Configuration
field.comment: Select how individual gender/age group can be identified using your attributes data.

field.label: Is it multi brand store?
field.comment:
Do you sell multiple brand/manufacturer products ?

If yes, please set the following configuration for Wizzy to identify a Brand from your catalogue's data.

field.label: Identified Using?
field.comment: Select how brands can be identified using your catalogue's data.

field.label: Identity
field.comment: Select how Wizzy picks the category values as brands.

field.label: Category Level
field.comment: Select category Level Wizzy should use as Brand.

field.label: Categories List
field.comment: Select all categories which Wizzy should use as a Brand.

field.label: Categories List
field.comment: Sub categories of selected categories will be used as Brand by Wizzy.

field.label: Attribute
field.comment: Select a attribute which Wizzy should use as a Brand.

field.label: Is brand mandatory for sync?
field.comment: Set it as yes if brand is mandatory data for products to sync. If brand is not preset for any product, It will be added under Skipped Entities.

field.label: Do you sell color variable products?
field.comment: If yes, please set the following configuration for Wizzy to identify Colors from your catalogue's data.

field.label: Attributes
field.comment: Select attribute(s) which Wizzy should use as colors.

field.label: Do you sell size variable products?
field.comment: If yes, please set the following configuration for Wizzy to identify product Sizes from your catalogue's data.

field.label: Attributes
field.comment: Select attribute(s) which Wizzy should use as sizes.

field.label: Create KSA Attribute ?
field.comment: Change to Yes if you would like to create KSA (Key Sizes Availability) Attribute for usage in products sorting.

field.label: Consider All Sizes as Key Sizes?
field.comment: Select No if you would like mention only few Sizes as key sizes.

field.label: Key Sizes
field.comment: Mention all Keys sizes separated by comma.

field.label: Ignore Description ?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to ignore product description in search. Recommended to set is as yes if having search relevancy issues due to description.

field.label: Common Words to Remove
field.comment:
Product description content sometimes has common words which is breaking the search relevance. Mention all words line by line in textarea which needs to removed from description during sync.

Each word MUST be in different line.

field.label: Use MSRP price as original price?
field.comment: If yes, Wizzy will consider MSRP as the original price of products and discounts will be calculated based on it. If MSRP price is not preset regular_price will be used as fallback.

field.label: MSRP Attribute
field.comment: Select attribute which Wizzy should use as MSRP.

field.label: Thumbnail Width
field.comment: Image Thumbnail Width

field.label: Thumbnail Height
field.comment: Image Thumbnail Height

field.label: Replace child's Main Image with Parent
field.comment: Set this to true, If Wizzy has to consider `mainImage` of the parent product in child products as well? This will override child's main Image even if they are set.

field.label: Hover Image
field.comment: Select type of image which you want to show as a Hover Image.

field.label: Thumbnail Image
field.comment: Select type of image which you want to show as a Thumbnail Image.

field.label: Replace child's Name with Parent
field.comment: parent product in child products as well?

field.label: Extra Attributes to be Synced
field.comment: By default, Wizzy syncs all attributes which are set as true for filterable / searchable. Select extra attributes you want in Wizzy product's object except these.

field.label: Placeholder
field.comment: Placeholder text for search input textbox.

field.label: Enable Animated Placeholder?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to enable animated placeholder.

field.label: Add Terms For Animated Placeholder
field.comment: Add the terms you want to display in animated placeholder.

field.label: DOM Selector
field.comment: DOM Selector on theme template to display search results

field.label: URL Endpoint
field.comment: Search URL endpoint to display search results. Update this only when you have overridden the search route configured by this extension.

field.label: Products Per Page
field.comment: Number of products to display in a single page.

field.label: Display Add to Cart button?
field.comment: Select yes if you want to display Add to Cart button on search results page.

field.label: Display Add to Wishlist button?
field.comment: Select yes if you want to display Add to Wishlist button on search results page.

field.label: Display tile view?
field.comment: Select yes, if you would like to show Select Tile View option on the search result page.

field.label: Facets
field.comment: Label and Position is ignored for All fields and label is ignored for All attributes.

field.label: Display Inside Drawer?
field.comment: Choose Yes if you would like to display facets under drawer.

field.label: Filters and Sort Icon Position in Mobile View
field.comment: By default Wizzy display Filters and Sort button at the bottom in the mobile view. Change it to top if you would like to have it changed with an offset.

field.label: Filters and Sort Icon Offset in Mobile View
field.comment: Please write the offset from top of the mobile view.

field.label: Categories Rendering Method
field.comment: The way category facet needs to be rendered on search results page.

field.label: Left Facets Collapsible?
field.comment: Choose yes if you want to make the left facets collapsible.

field.label: Left Facets Default Behaviour
field.comment: Select collapsed if you want the facets to be closed by default, otherwise Opened.

field.label: First Left Facet Default Behaviour
field.comment: Select collapsed if you want the first facet to be closed by default, otherwise Opened.

field.label: Pagination Type
field.comment: Select the type of pagination for search results page.

field.label: Infinite Scroll Offset (Desktop)
field.comment: Enter value for infinite scroll offset (Desktop)

field.label: Infinite Scroll Offset (Mobile)
field.comment: Enter value for infinite scroll offset (Mobile)

field.label: Add move to top Widget?
field.comment: Recommended to set it as Yes if pagination type is infinite scrolling.

field.label: Swatch Options
field.comment: Select the swatches you want to display on search results page. First swatch is considered as primary swatch and other swatches are rendered based on that. Maximum 2 swatches is advisable to display in search results page.

field.label: Title
field.comment: Title for No Results Page.

field.label: Display Pinned Products?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to display pinned products when the user lands on the no results found page.

field.label: Categories
field.comment: Select Category which Wizzy should use to display products on no results found page.

field.label: Number of products to display
field.comment: Enter number of pinned products to display on no results found page, This can not be more then 50.

field.label: Sub Title
field.comment: Sub Title for no Results Page.

field.label: Suggestions Count
field.comment:
Enter number of suggestions to display in autocomplete menu.
This must be between 1 and 20. Any other value will break the functionality of suggestion menu.

field.label: Alignment
field.comment: Select alignment of the autocomplete menu beneath search input.

field.label: Categories Title
field.comment: Title to display for categories section in menu.

field.label: Others Title
field.comment: Title to display for others section in menu.

field.label: Brands Title
field.comment: Title to display for brands section in menu.

field.label: Sections
field.comment: Add the sections you want to display in autocomplete menu. If none provided, by default Wizzy display all four sections. Section names must be from ("categories", "pages", "brands" or "others").

field.label: No Results Behaviour
field.comment: Select behaviour when there are no products or suggestions to display in menu.

field.label: No Results Text
field.comment: Text to display when there are no products or suggestions to display in menu.

field.label: Suggest Top Products?
field.comment: Enable/Disable top products display in autocomplete menu.

field.label: Top Products Title
field.comment: Title text for top products section in autocomplete menu.

field.label: Number of products to display
field.comment: Enter number of products to display in autocomplete menu, This can not be more then 10.

field.label: Do you want to ignore any Category in suggestions and filters list?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to ignore selected set of categories in suggestions and filters list.

field.label: Categories to Ignore
field.comment: Select list of Categories that you want to ignore in suggestions and filters list.

field.label: Sync Pages?
field.comment: Set it to Yes, If you want to make pages searchable on frontend and wants to sync. If you're switching the setting from No to Yes then you will need to execute wizzy_pages_indexer.

field.label: Pages Title
field.comment: Title text for pages section in autocomplete menu.

field.label: Exclude Pages
field.comment: Select pages to exclude in suggestions.

group.label: Attributes to add in Autocomplete
group.comment:
Select user defined attributes you want to appear in autocomplete along with category.

Leather[Attribute] Shoes[Category]
Gifts[Category] for[Glue] Mom[Attribute]


1. In first example position of the attribute is front.
2. In second example position of the attribute is back with glue value.

(glue is non-mandatory field, and can be left blank if not required)

field.label: Show Default Suggestions ?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to display default suggestions in autocomplete menu.

field.label: Display Recently Searched Terms ?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to display top 10 recently search termed when user clicks on Search input box.

field.label: Display Pinned Terms ?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to display pinned searched termed when user clicks on Search input box.

field.label: Add Terms
field.comment: Add the terms you want to display in autocomplete menu (Maximum 10 can be added)

field.label: Show Default Products ?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to display default products in autocomplete menu.

field.label: Display Pinned Products ?
field.comment: Select Yes if you want to display pinned products when user clicks on Search input box.

field.label: Categories
field.comment: Select Category which Wizzy should use to display pinned products.

field.label: Pinned Products Count
field.comment: Enter number of pinned products to display in autocomplete menu, This can not be more then 10.

field.label: Include Custom CSS?
field.comment:
If selected as yes, Module will load custom.css
This helps to just override the styles.

field.label: Template Attributes
field.comment:
Select all attributes which values you want to access in overridden search/autocomplete templates.

Mustache tags for selected attributes will be the attribute keys.

field.label: Products Sync Batch Size
field.comment: Select the number of products you want to add for sync in one batch. It needs to be between 50 to 3500.

field.label: Dequeue Size
field.comment: Select the number of batch you want to add for sync. It needs to be between 1 to 10.

field.label: Add Associated Products In Sync on Attribue Save ?
field.comment: Select No if you don't want to add associated products in Sync on attribue save.

field.label: Enable Sync Debugging ?
field.comment: If enabled, Wizzy will generate some logs during sync to debug and fix any bugs.

field.label: Add All Products in Sync on Full Reindex
field.comment: Select No if youre doing frequent full reindex and do not want all products to sync again with Wizzy.

field.label: Store
field.comment: Select store from where you want to copy configurations.

group.label: Redirecting to the Queue Processors Status Page...
Redirecting to the Skipped Entities Page...

field.label: Product Ids
field.comment: Write Product IDs JSON array to be synced

field.label: Store
field.comment: Select store for which you want to debug sync.
